octeon_droq_t Struct Reference

#include <octeon_droq.h>

Detailed Description

The Descriptor Ring Output Queue structure.

This structure has all the information required to implement a Octeon DROQ.

Definition at line 93 of file octeon_droq.h.

Definition at line 134 of file octeon_droq.h.

uint32_t octeon_droq_t::max_empty_descs

The max number of descriptors in DROQ without a buffer.

This field is used to keep track of empty space threshold. If the refill_count reaches this value, the DROQ cannot accept a max-sized (64K) packet.

Definition at line 146 of file octeon_droq.h.

void* octeon_droq_t::pkts_sent_reg

Pointer to the mapped packet sent register.

Octeon writes the number of packets DMA'ed to host memory in this register.
